com.rjrudin.marklogic.client

Class ClientHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rjrudin.marklogic.client.LoggingObject
      • com.rjrudin.marklogic.client.ClientHelper

  • public class ClientHelper
extends LoggingObject
    The intent of this class is to provide some syntactic sugar on common operations using the ML Java API, which is a wrapper around the ML REST API.
